column3: Wow I managed to super confuse myself in testing here...fixed both issues.

It appears I throughly confused myself trying to test, again, but you can see an equivalent version (patched to work on my repo) clearly passing at https://travis-ci.org/TheBlueMatt/bitcoin/jobs/197481158
I know I can be number-blind sometimes, but isn't this the same as the entry above it?
Yes. He already did this in April last year. https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7921
The repo is flattened by distdir a few lines above, so this should not work here...\n\nYou may want to try to move it up to where it does the check-doc.py, maybe.

Are you sure this is working. I could imagine gpg needs the keys first. Something like
```sh
while read line; do travis_retry gpg --keyserver hkp://pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys $line; done < contrib/verify-commits/trusted-keys; fi
```

would do it, but it might not be enough. I tried to do this once but I gave up as it was too tricky to get right on travis...
